survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their dining experience at our restaurant, including food quality, service, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you dine at our restaurant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you dine at our restaurant?

questions.question_text: What type of cuisine did you order during your visit? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of cuisine did you order during your visit? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food you ordered?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food you ordered?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the service provided by our staff?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency with Q3.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the service provided by our staff?

questions.question_text: Was your order delivered in a timely manner?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who ordered food.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge efficiency.

script.question_text: Was your order delivered in a timely manner?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who ordered food.

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for your visit today?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for your visit today?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our restaurant to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our restaurant to others?

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any issues during your visit? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any issues during your visit? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities did you use during your visit? (Select all that apply)

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities did you use during your visit? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your dining experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather constructive feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your dining experience?
